/usr/bin/c++    -fPIC -Wall -Wno-sign-compare -Wno-uninitialized -O3 -DNDEBUG     -Wl,-rpath  -Wl,/usr/local/lib  -Wl,--enable-new-dtags CMakeFiles/compute_image_mean.dir/compute_image_mean.cpp.o  -o compute_image_mean -rdynamic ../lib/libcaffe.so ../lib/libproto.a -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lpthread -lpthread -lglog -lgflags -lprotobuf -lpthread -lglog -lgflags -lprotobuf -lhdf5_hl -lhdf5 -llmdb -lleveldb -lsnappy /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcurand.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcublas.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libopencv_highgui.so.2.4.8 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libopencv_imgproc.so.2.4.8 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libopencv_core.so.2.4.8 -llapack_atlas -lcblas -latlas -lpython2.7 -lboost_python /usr/local/lib/libmpi.so /usr/local/nccl/lib/libnccl.so -Wl,-rpath,/ssd/lijingling/resnet_MSRA/caffe-mpi/build/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/nccl/lib::::::::
